text:
📬 7 more days to mail or drop off your absentee ballot for #CArecall

✅ If 50% or more vote NO, the governor would remain in office 

🖊️ Voters can vote on either one or both parts of the recall ballot

🔎 More info: https://t.co/ZEi8D1elMp

#VoteNoOnTheRecall #CripTheVote https://t.co/Ly3P3ePJBi
